website_summaries.verdict: If your older pet needs to lose a few pounds, try this senior version of the Victor premium dog food.
pros: Most of the ingredients in this food are protein, filling your dog up with fewer calories
Helps get your dog back to a healthy weight quickly
Good for dogs with allergy problems
cons: While most dogs seem to like this food, some do not

website_summaries.verdict: Gentle formula helps older dogs maintain a healthy weight.
pros: Easy to digest formula converts fat energy into muscle development
Combination of amino acids, minerals, and essential fatty acids contribute to a soft, shiny coat
cons: Food has an overpowering meaty scent

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula BOO
customer_reviews.text: Not happy they have changed the formula since my last order. My 16 year old dog now has loose stools or seems to strain at times and doesn't seem to be doing well since I've been giving her the new formula. I guess I will have to find a new food after being happy with this food for years. Very disappointed with Victor, If it's not broke DON'T fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady B.

customer_reviews.title: War of the kibble
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is helping our senior dog, he’s still trucking along and looking less like a blob and more like a baked potato, but we also have a three year old husky who is stealing from his elder. The senior, Sir Niles de Galahad, proceeds to steal in retaliation from the husky, The Timber of James’ bowl. It’s difficult to tell how much of which food Niles gets, but spudsville is a definite improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Megeath

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: Started ordering this for a 2yr old lab who’s had both ‘ACLs’ repaired for the supplements and for a 6yr old rescue that we’ve had for a four months who was obese and wasn’t losing weight fast enough. No negative side effects so far, and the 6 yr old is finally losing a little more in the past 2 months. FYI I did speak with Victor and my bet about making sure my 2yr old could eat this and get his enough nutrients. Still has high protein, just lower fat content. So when he’s less active for winter this should keep his weight maintained.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Elderly dog will now get up and come for his meals.  Our dogs really enjoy meal time!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product and this was my first order, but my orders will continue, Our dogs eat with gusto, our elderly dog had to be lured to the feeding bowl, not anymore. Very happy with the product, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bottomley

customer_reviews.title: My rating relates to ONE specific bag only.
customer_reviews.text: At the bottom of the bag were chunks of kibble with mold on them. I had to throw most of it away but kept a few to take a picture of. I hope I didn't feed any to my dogs without noticing it. This bag was delivered on 5/8, and on 5/26 I received another bag of dog kibble (different brand). I mention this to show that the Victor bag wasn't sitting around here for 6 months or whatever. I ordered this brand before for my four senior dogs and they liked it (that's why I gave it 2 stars instead of 1), but I can't trust the brand any more.
customer_reviews.author: Mieze

customer_reviews.title: It's not a good fit for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had a lot of belly issues since changing to this food. I tapered off of the old food over a three week period and have been solely using this food now for 3 months. Since then, my dog has had lots of gas, a noisy stomach, diarrhea, and she somewhat frequently is skipping meals. I have no idea if this food is causing the digestive issues, but I didn't have these issues on my last food (that became too expensive) so I plan to try something different. Other feedback.. the food ships fast, I appreciate the 40lb size, and the food bag packaging seems nice
customer_reviews.author: Jeremylaux

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog food!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good dog food for weight management. Our Maltese was gaining weight as she gets older and her joints were starting to affect her getting around on a daily basis. This food helped with both. Her weight has slowed down and she seems to get around better. She seems to like the taste as well. So win win!! The price isn’t bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Lovvorn

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves Victor Senior dry food.
customer_reviews.text: When the vet said my border collie/Aussie was over weight at 4 years old, she recommended switching to a senior diet. I gradually switched to the senior in the brand to which she was accustomed. She did not like it and stopped eating. Victor brand senior was recommended by my groomer so tried it. She loves it and has lost weight as well. A healthy, tasty dog food.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love I have had the best experience with victor food. My dogs have very sensitive digestive systems and my Dane has skin issues. This has been the best food for those issues. No more diarrhea. And all three of my picky dogs love the taste of this food. I have tried different flavored and they like the all.
customer_reviews.author: amy jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Victor is a good product and I’m glad it could be delivered. Our local store sometimes won’t bring the bags to the car. And I can’t lift them. So while it’s a little more expensive to do it this way it’s worth it not to pull My back. I have to call them now because they are putting both bags in the same box. And I can’t lift it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable high quality food
customer_reviews.text: Have been feeding my dog this food for about a month and have seen noticeable improvements in his energy and weight. Excited to see the continued progress the longer he eats it. Very fair price for a high quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fudge

customer_reviews.title: He loves his new food and has lost a couple of pounds which has been better for his hips since he’s a bigger dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog is getting up there in years and the vet said he needed to be on a low fat dog food. I started reading reviews online and decided to go with Victor. He loves his new food and has lost a couple of pounds which has been better for his hips since he’s a bigger dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: A good price for this premium dog food. Especially good deal when with free shipping via Amazon Prime. My dogs have been eating Victor Dog food (various Victor products) for several years. They like it quite well and have been happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am transitioning from grain free dog food to one with grains. Not only does my dog eat this only when starving, but she has developed some skin problems since starting.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Girl Grunt

customer_reviews.title: Dog had trouble with this product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it to work but my dog got diarrhea when we switched...and yes I introduced it gradually.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Twanda

customer_reviews.title: No Way Mom!
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't care for the food. I have tried everything to get him to eat in including camouflaging it in with other food.
customer_reviews.author: SharonG

customer_reviews.title: She loves it...I love the glucosamine!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog food. It is great for my slightly overweight pup and it has glucosamine in it for her joints. When she is not eating this, I have to give her a supplement as well. She seems to like the flavor but she isn't picky at all when it comes to food.
customer_reviews.author: K McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Victor=beautiful, healthy coat
customer_reviews.text: My Chesapeake Bay Retriever, Rumble, has the thickest, most healthy coat he has had in the 8 years I have had him. The only down side to that is, that now that he is shedding out his winter coat, there is SO much to brush out and vacuum up!! And I love having Victor delivered to my front door with no shipping charge. This is a quality food, and I am glad I was finally able to find it after searching for a year: at AMAZON? Who knew?!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Wythers

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I feed my dog
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old fawn Doberman has been on this for three years now and it's kept his coat shiny and joints in excellent shape for years. Fawns show age much faster than red or black Dobies so I've tried to give him the best of everything. No other food gave him the decent coat or bounce that this has. It's not sold in stores in my area so I'm very grateful that I can get it through here.
customer_reviews.author: Pandarus33

customer_reviews.title: No more scratching.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. She cleans the bowl every time. What I have noticed about this food is my dog doesn't scratch anymore ! She must have had some allergies with the old food I was giving her. This food seems to be ok. I will be re-ordering here soon. Great outcome so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dwane Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Our dog feels better than ever!
customer_reviews.text: Our australian cattle dog was gaining weight like crazy, became lethargic, had terrible skin problems and never wanted to eat. After years of buying every type of food on the market and even trying to prepare him fresh food every day we still couldn't solve the problems. We finally came across Victor dog food and our 7 year old pup feels better than ever! He instantly began dropping weight, had a ton of energy, no bad breath, ears stopped itching. He's like a puppy again compared to how he's been the last few years. We will continue to purchase Victor products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Breana Lixey

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES this food!
customer_reviews.text: I love this healthy option for my fur baby! I mix it with some raw food and warm water to help add nutrients and aid in better digestion, but my dog loves it so much that he will eat it raw! He likes to start snacking right out of the storage bin when I refill it with a new bag of this food!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved this food! I bought a small bag to try it, but no worries there! While slowly changing them over from their old food to this, they picked every kibble of this food out and left all the old kibbles in the bowl! I will keep buying this brand even though the price is higher than my usual brand. From all the reviews I've read, this is a top-notch food, and now that I know my pack loves it, I'm sold on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Haffener

customer_reviews.title: I received dog food that had expired!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because it had a 40% discount. You get what you pay for and even less! Purchased end of October 2019 with a expiration date of July 2019! Victor's dog food is great if it is purchased before it expires! Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: winterottor

customer_reviews.title: Great for my old dog
customer_reviews.text: This food along with better portion control helped my dog get down to a more healthy weight. Also the pieces are small as well which he enjoys. Slightly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES this flavor
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much I cut back my older girl never lost weight till I tried this. My older girl when she hears me get in the bucket she comes to look then waits at her spot where she feeds.
customer_reviews.author: Jonilea Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dog food suggested by Lab Breeder
customer_reviews.text: It’s better than Hills Science Diet and Blue buffalo dog foods. Our lab is 8 and she’s been on this one year and huge difference in energy, coat and dog health
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: 2 dogs hated it and got sick everytime they'd eat it
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs hated this food (we mixed it with old food over 2 weeks). Made one dog throw up every time and gave the other diarrhea! I see most people give it 4-5 stars but both of my dogs disagree! Eventually had to go buy them a new bag of different food so they could eat & keep something down. As soon as we switched food they both quit getting sick.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not good for our dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog had diarrhea the entire time we had her on this dog food. I can't recommend it because of that, we had to switch back to blue buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Works for our dog
customer_reviews.text: My beagle has very sensitive skin, and we had a hard time finding food that didn't cause a rash. He loves this food, no rash, and still gets excited every meal time even though he's been eating this for several years now!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this food!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs, Delilah (Boxer) and Noelani (Australian Red Heeler) both in their senior years (9 years old) were switched to this kibble about six months ago. They both enjoy the taste of the kibble and seem to be benefiting from the quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Strader

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated by independent reviewers and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old lab loves it. Because her poop was loose I mix a scoop full of canned pumpkin with it. She loves it and no more poop problems. This product is highly rated by internet reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has good ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Great food that my dog loves. Dog food critics rate it high.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sheds alot
customer_reviews.text: Made my dogs sheds alot and have some bold spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs needed a limited ingredient food. This one has been great. Have used for two years. No issue. Quality and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Dana mcd

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got the monthly delivery program and am very happy with my purchase. Recommended from a family member and am happy to provide a quality food item for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My lab has been on a diet due to arthritis issues. He lives this food. This is the 3rd Victor product I have tried, extremely pleased with each.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a quality product. My dog likes it, and he's lost weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The dog likes Victor Senior Healthy Weight Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: The dog likes Victor Senior Healthy Weight Dry Dog Food. Buying large bags on Amazon is convenient and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Food for Fluffy Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs liked it (but they’ll eat anything lol). It’s a good food that gets high reviews. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the food
customer_reviews.text: Love the food. Bought it on Prime for 48.50. 40 lb bag. Just checked again and the food is now 71.50. Too bad. This food was really good for my dog but now I have to shop else ware for this food or try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wiliams

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I fed my senior dog according to the bag and he gained 10 lbs over 3 months. He was sluggish and acted like an old dog. He has been off for two weeks and is acting like a puppy. Horrible and not healthy weight product at all
customer_reviews.author: Yllw1313

customer_reviews.title: Victor for four
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 big dogs and it is a great food when you need feed for 4.
customer_reviews.author: Carol f.

customer_reviews.title: Apparently tastes bad
customer_reviews.text: Dogs literally refuse to eat it. I mixed with another food to ease them into it and they literally pick all the other pieces out and leave all of this.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for Senior Pet
customer_reviews.text: My dogs did really well on this and I am very happy with the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. He has always been fed Victor brand. He is a very healthy dog.
customer_reviews.author: mother of the bride

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves it and has been more active and alert
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Yorkie/Maltese mix dogs (4 yrs old) were starting to gain weight and since my 2 yr. old Rottweiler loves the Victor Active (green bag) I decided to try the healthy weight formula for the other two. They LOVE it and it has small kibble which is great for the little dogs.
customer_reviews.author: friley

customer_reviews.title: Likes but adores the salmon
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended Victor to us. The nuggets are small for our dachshund mix, but she loves the salmon sweet potato best
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVED it...
customer_reviews.text: Our two dogs love this new food, it was recommended to us by our son and are we happy we checked it out. Very good for active dogs. Super healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Niles

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food! They've lost some weight too!
customer_reviews.author: GolfNFool18

customer_reviews.title: Seems this company has hard time getting their product out for deliveries .
customer_reviews.text: My older dogs adjusted very well switching to this food.
customer_reviews.author: JWhite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this food and is slowly losing weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs around like a puppy and I don't have to give her ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 year old English Mastiff who has arthritis and was overweight. Since she started eating this, she has lost weight, runs around like a puppy and I don't have to give her pain pills very much at all anymore. She loves the taste and I am happy to find something that works that doesn't break my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: MissBentley

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients. Rated very highly on dog food advisor ...
customer_reviews.text: Good ingredients. Rated very highly on dog food advisor website. My dogs love it. One of my dogs has lost some of her excess weight, since I switched her to this.
customer_reviews.author: Lytningbolts

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic food!
customer_reviews.text: I have two German Shepherds who love this food. The older female was overweight when my son brought her here to live, at 7 years old, and this food has been wonderful. She has slimmed down and her joints are better. I love this food.
customer_reviews.author: Niakyla C Spain

customer_reviews.title: Have not seen much improvement in my dogs walking from ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not seen much improvement in my dogs walking from hip issues but did not expect that any food can do such improvements. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Buffaloe

customer_reviews.title: My pack loves this kibble!
customer_reviews.text: Love the actual low calorie content but great nutrition of this food. And my dogs will eat it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Slobecheski

customer_reviews.title: Quality of food
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it. Can see the difference of this food. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Bean

customer_reviews.title: Poor flavor
customer_reviews.text: None of my dogs liked it. I don’t know why but they would not eat it, and they like food.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: This food has made our dog like a puppy again
customer_reviews.text: This food has made our dog like a puppy again. Our 8 year old has arthritis in her ankle and was doing horribly. She was having a hard time even standing up. After switching to this food, which we supplement with fish oil, she is like a new dog. We have been feeding her this food for 5 months and now she goes on runs with me.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Pridemore Matthews

customer_reviews.title: My dog Hershey is a lab mix that is 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog Hershey is a lab mix that is 15 years old. He will not take Glucosamine even when I buy expensive caramels for him. However he loves this food. I no longer have to force him to eat something he doesn't want and he is getting his Glucosamine .
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog at healthy weight
customer_reviews.text: My dog Loves Victor. Victor helps maintain Sammy Sue at a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: great experience and our little buddy loves this
customer_reviews.text: made the switch from baneful, was making our dog very sick, after a few days our little pal is doing well and loving his new food.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it had so many vitamins and ingredients I was looking for. My dog has severe hip dysplasia so keeping his weight managed is another benefit.
customer_reviews.author: MarieP#1King

customer_reviews.title: My finicky dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 year old lab mix who has always been a picky eater (obviously not the lab part of his mix). Anyway, I tried this at the recommendation from a friend and we have success. He's put a little bit of needed weight and cleans his dish. He's also perked up some but I'm not sure if it's the food....although I'll give the food some credit since he is now eating regularly.
customer_reviews.author: PenguinDreams

customer_reviews.title: Great food for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching off and on for decent dog food at a good price, and after consulting the dog food advisor website decided to try Victor. The result - my dog loves it and seems much healthier (I also started him on a probiotic at the same time). He is more spry and less gassy. I do order this food from Amazon as it ends up being cheaper than direct.
customer_reviews.author: murrr77

customer_reviews.title: One of the better kibble foods I could find for my senior dog ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the better kibble foods I could find for my senior dog with joint issues that didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for your aging pup!
customer_reviews.text: Grain free....pup loves it...our breeder swears by it...great dog food! Should have made 2015 Best Dog Foods.

customer_reviews.title: My picky eaters love this
customer_reviews.text: I went through about 10 foods before I founds this. My boys love it

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: great price, love the food the dogs love it and it is delivered to the door. Ingredients are top notch I don't feed my dogs crap and this is top of the line

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our seniors dogs need to lose some weight so we are giving this a try. They seem to love it.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.

customer_reviews.text: Great quality dry dog kibble, my senior lab is a fan. I know it is a quality product and would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Victor foods are the best
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 corgis which love to eat and need to keep their weight inline or it can affect their backs. This food has helped my older corgi whom will be 10 in April lose weight and it keeps my younger one in the correct weight range. I was introduced to Victor foods by the breeder who I got my younger corgi from and I have bought the adult, grain free-salmon, and the senior.

customer_reviews.text: We had been using Wellness brand and our dog had some pretty horrendous gas issues and loose stools. He still has occassional gas bombs, but very much improved with this and it cleared up the other problem too.

customer_reviews.title: Not my dog's choice

customer_reviews.text: My dog says if he has to eat unappetizing, bone dry, pelletized, ground up something or other, this stuff is as good as any.

customer_reviews.text: My two dogs ate more of it than the regular so I do not see the purpose of using it.

customer_reviews.text: Hope it does what they say, I have a pudgy Doberman, not a pretty sight.

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog that eats almost everything.  Put this down as canned spinach  for her.
customer_reviews.text: Listened to the reviews again. $55 lost. Bought it for the glocosamine, but my dog won't eat this or the Canidae brand. She loves the cheap store food at $15 a bag. Guess I just have to supplement the glocosamine .
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jeremy Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best kibble!
customer_reviews.text: We have a pack of 8 dogs of varying sizes, ages and weights. They are also a picky bunch. Victor is the best we have ever had. They all love it. The overweight dogs have slimmed down amazingly. The others maintain their weight. And they all act like young pups. Their ages run from 14 yrs old yo 4 yrs old. And they doing fabulous on VICTOR. But it is much cheaper on CHEWY
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Slobecheski

customer_reviews.title: Victor Senior Healthy Weight Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive but I was getting tired of switching brands every time there was a recall on various other brands. Also there is the periodic problem with coat and skin with other brands. Both our dogs and our two cats have beautiful coats and no longer experience occasional skin issues after using Victor pet food. Our dogs are getting older and both have back problems so finding this food was great as it has Glucosamine for joint health and it is wonderful for their weight control.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M. Dever

product_meta.title: Victor Senior Healthy Weight Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Size:15 lb

VICTOR Senior Healthy Weight is an excellent choice for older dogs that are less active, and adult dogs that need to reduce overall weight. This multi-protein, nutrient-dense formula is specially formulated for breeds that are susceptible to joint issues.

VICTOR Senior Healthy Weight for Dogs is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for Adult Maintenance.

CALORIE CONTENT (Calculated ME):

3385 kcal/kg; 360 kcal/cup

GUARANTEED ANALYSIS: 

Crude Protein ------------- 27.0% ( Min.), 
Crude Fat ------------------ 11.5% ( Min.), 
Crude Fiber ----------------- 4.5% ( Max.), 
Moisture -------------------- 9.0% ( Max.), 
Linoleic Acid (Omega 6) --- 2.6% ( Min.), 
Linolenic Acid (Omega 3) -- 0.4% ( Min.), 
DHA ------------------------- 0.1% ( Min.), 
Zinc -------------------- 150 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Selenium -------------- 0.35 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Vitamin E ---------------- 150 IU/kg ( Min.), 
L-Carnitine* -------------- 80 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Glucosamine* ------------ 800 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Chondroitin* ------------- 300 mg/kg ( Min.), 

*Not recognized as an essential nutrient by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles

INGREDIENTS: 

Beef Meal, Whole Grain Brown Rice, Whole Grain Millet, Grain Sorghum, Chicken Fat (preserved with Mixed Tocopherols), Menhaden Fish Meal (source of DHA-Docosahexaenoic Acid), Yeast Culture, Chicken Meal, Pork Meal, Peas, Dehydrated Alfalfa Meal, Blood Meal, Natural Flavor, Potassium Chloride, Carrot Powder, Tomato Pomace (source of Lycopene), Taurine, Salt, Choline Chloride, Dried Seaweed Meal, Zinc Methionine Complex, Vitamin E Supplement, Hydrolyzed Yeast, Iron Amino Acid Complex, Calcium Carbonate, Manganese Amino Acid Complex, Ferrous Sulfate, L-Carnitine, Glucosamine Hydrochloride, Selenium Yeast, Copper Sulfate, Niacin Supplement, Vitamin B12 Supplement, D-Calcium Pantothenate, Vitamin A Supplement, Thiamine Mononitrate, Biotin, Riboflavin Supplement, Calcium Iodate, Chondroitin Sulfate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Powdered Cellulose, Brewers Dried Yeast, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Dried Aspergillus Oryzae Fermentation Extract, Dried Trichoderma Longibrachiatum Fermentation Extract, Dried Bacillus Subtilis Fermentation Extract, Silicon Dioxide, Tetra Sodium Pyrophosphate, Vegetable Oil, Rosemary Extract, Green Tea Extract, Spearmint Extract, Lecithin, Fructooligosaccharide, Folic Acid, Yucca Schidigera Extract

FEEDING GUIDELINES: 

Refer to Recommended Feeding Chart for Adult Dogs. 
Number of Cups Per Day (8 oz measuring cup)

Feeding for Adult Maintenance: 



10 lbs. ------ ¾ cup 
15 lbs. ------ 1 ⅛ cups 
20 lbs. ------ 1 ½ cups 
30 lbs. ------ 2 ¼ cups 
40 lbs. ------ 2 ¾ cups 
60 lbs. ------ 3 ¾ cups 
80 lbs. ------ 4 ⅔ cups 
100 lbs. ----- 5 ½ cups

Increase feeding intake by ½ cup for every 20 lbs over 100 lbs

 Feeding For Weight Loss (25% Calorie Reduction from Maintenance Level): 

10 lbs. ------ ⅔ cup 
15 lbs. ------ 1 cup 
20 lbs. ------ 1 ⅓ cups 
30 lbs. ------ 1 ¾ cups 
40 lbs. ------ 2 ¼ cups 
60 lbs. ------ 3 cups 
80 lbs. ------ 3 ⅝ cups 
100 lbs. ----- 4 ⅓ cups

FEEDING ADULT DOGS:

Glucosamine and Chondroitin are unique ingredients that work together to support joint health. This formula can be fed to any adult dog, and is beneficial for active and performance dogs, as well as larger breeds that may be susceptible to joint issues later in life. It is generally recommended to start feeding large breeds a glucosamine and chondroitin fortified food early in life (between 1 and 2 years) and continue feeding long term for most effective results.

TIPS ON TRANSITIONING TO VICTOR:

When changing from a different food to any VICTOR dog food formula, transition your dog to VICTOR over the course of one week to 10 days, gradually increasing the amount of VICTOR every few days.

Keep fresh water available at all times
feature_bullets: Nutrient-dense recipe made with premium-quality beef, chicken, pork and fish meals
Ideal for older dogs that are less active, and adult dogs that need to reduce overall weight
Glucosamine and Chondroitin promote long-term joint health
Formulated with our scientifically advanced, proven VICTOR Core ingredients to promote healthy immune and digestive systems
Ideal for dogs with allergies to other meat proteins. Made from gluten free grains
